entry.title: My First Post
entry.content: This is my first personal webiste. Danni helped me a lot in building the enviroment!The blog would track my daily study and thoughts. Hopefully, I can update it continuouslyâ€¦Useful links to build your hexo website:https://hexo.io/docs/setuphttps://www.jianshu.com/p/5fc4672b7d2e
